message: Status: UI for the CLI growing nicely.

I've got some bizarre syntax errors in the FB console, which I thought were down to require.js loading text resources using <script type=invalid> tags, but that seems not to be the case (at least they don't show up in the DOM that way)
Updating require.js to latest doesn't help
FB Console means Firebug Tracing Console?
i'm assuming that this is an issue with requirejs BTW
the problem is the same in chrome (from memory - runs off to check)
I do find that when errors seems bizarre, I will quite often get a different error in Chrome
i.e. the thing with the tab named 'console'
those are requirejs's fault, i think

I know at least about 4 consoles (1) the system console (usually the black os window), (2) Firefox Error Console, (3) Firebug Console panel - for web developers, (4) Firebug Tracing console - for Firebug developers. I guess you are talking about #3.... ?
however the errors are also on #5
aha. you noticed that it's not actually the 21st. good catch :)
so clearly not an FB problem
is the tracing console different from the normal console?
